sentence.Network_en: Donetsk , Mr Yanukovich's hometown, was the industrial heartland of the Union.

sentence.Network_en: I did not insist to be called - up for Donetsk!
sentence.Network_cn: 我不坚持在对顿涅茨克的比赛中被征召!

sentence.Network_en: Since 1965 he has been working at Donetsk State Technical University.
sentence.Network_cn: 自1965年起,他一直在顿涅茨克国立技术大学工作.
